org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure

Class AbstractCoauthorGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.AbstractCoauthorGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DblpInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCoauthorGraph, SimpleLazyCoauthorGraph, WeightedCoauthorGraph
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractCoauthorGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements DblpInterface
    Provides default implementations for an MMDB based coauthor graph implementation of the DblpInterface.

                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Deprecated.

        Parameters:
        input - The dblp XML input stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur while parsing the XML.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur while parsing the XML.
